info.title: Proxy-Spider Proxies
info.description: The most reliable premium proxy servers list. Http and socks proxies updated daily in IP PORT txt, json, csv and xml format.

get.description: This is a free sample of ten proxies. Sign up and receive the full list.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: Add this to retrieve only proxies at this location. Comma-separate multiple values to search with OR condition.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of proxies to retrieve.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The sort order. "best" will return the most reliable proxies first in the list.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number, for queries matching more than limit number of results. Start with page 1, then if has_next_page is true, increase the page number on your next query with the same parameters.

parameters.name: protocols
parameters.description: Add this to retrieve only proxies with a specific protocol. Comma-separate multiple values to search with AND condition.

parameters.name: response_time
parameters.description: Add this to retrieve only proxies with a specific response time. Comma-separate multiple values to search with OR condition.

parameters.name: supports
parameters.description: Add this to retrieve only proxies that support these capabilities. Comma-separate multiple values to search with AND condition.

parameters.name: test
parameters.description: Set this to true to make a test API call. All proxies will be 0.0.0.0 and the call will not count against your daily allowance.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Add this to retrieve only proxies with a type. Comma-separate multiple values to search with OR condition.
